text: Andrew Smith Hallidie took his San Francisco cable car for its first test run. The tracks ran from Clay and Kearny Streets for 2800 feet to a hill 307 feet above.
The US Navy recalled Captain Grace Murray Hopper to active duty to help develop the programming language COBOL.
MTV began broadcasting in the United States, playing The Buggles Video Killed the Radio Star, and changing how we view music forever.
Motorola announced the Moto X Android phone with multiple customization options. It was the first phone designed entirely after Google bought Motorola.
